translation.en: [woman] It came to me in a dream.
translation.fr: Tout m'est apparu dans un rêve.

translation.en: Hair is beauty.
Hair is emotion.
Hair is our heritage.
Hair tells us who we are, where we've been,
translation.fr: Les cheveux révèlentqui on est, ce qu'on a vécu

translation.en: and where we're going.
-My name is Sarah Breedlove. -[crowd cheering]
Making products for our hair is my passion.
translation.fr: Créer des produits capillairesest ma passion.

translation.en: Hasn't been easy,
but no matter what, I refuse to give up the fight.
translation.fr: mais quoi qu'il arrive,je refuse d'abandonner le combat.

translation.en: Addie Munroe's Magical Hair Grower!
Fifty cents a tin. Get Magical Hair Grower right here!
You got dandruff, ma'am?
You got bald patches?
Hair that won't grow? I got your fix! Right here, ladies!
translation.fr: Vos cheveux ne poussent pas ?J'ai la solution !

translation.en: Magical Hair Grow--
[woman] Heard of that stuff.
Do it work?
Saved my life.
[Sarah] Hair is power.
You can't imagine what it's like to lose it.
translation.fr: Vous ne pouvez pas savoirce que ça fait de les perdre.

translation.en: Seems like I was born to struggle.
The life of a washerwoman is hard.
translation.fr: La vie d'une blanchisseuse est difficile.

translation.en: I'd scrub my fingers to the bone for pennies.
translation.fr: Je frottais jusqu'à l'ospour pas grand-chose.

translation.en: Most days, I can't even make ends meet.
translation.fr: J'arrivais à peine à m'en sortir.

translation.en: After a while, I guess I just lost hope-- forgot how to dream.
translation.fr: Au bout d'un moment, j'ai perdu espoir.J'ai oublié comment rêver.

translation.en: That's when my hair started falling out.
translation.fr: C'est là que mes cheveuxont commencé à tomber.

translation.en: My husband Davis only made things worse.
translation.fr: Mon mari Davis ? Il a empiré les choses.

translation.en: He was arrested, and when he came back, he was a changed man.
translation.fr: Il a été arrêté et à son retour,ce n'était plus le même.

translation.en: [Davis] You look like a mangy dog.
-[Sarah] Baby, wait, don't go. -[Davis] No.
[Sarah] Please. Davis.
[Sarah] I was devastated.
Didn't know what I was gonna do.
translation.fr: Je ne savais pas quoi faire.

translation.en: I used to wonder if God don't like ugly, why did he make me?
translation.fr: Je me disais : Dieu n'aime pas la laideur,pourquoi m'a-t-il créée ?

translation.en: With so much beauty in this world, how come I got so little?
translation.fr: Il y a tant de beauté dans ce monde,pourquoi en ai-je si peu ?

translation.en: And then everything changed.
I'm Addie Munroe, and I would like to talk with you
translation.fr: Je suis Addie Munroe,et je veux vous parler

translation.en: about my new hair product.
You all right?
Is anyone here?
I'm-- I'm gonna help you.
It's gonna be just fine.
Oh, dear.
Oh, it's okay.
What happened?
I started using the Hair Grower that day.
translation.fr: J'utilise ce soin depuis ce jour.

translation.en: In a few months' time, my hair came back.
Look at how your hair is growing.
Thanks to you.
I don't know why I'm so surprised. My Magical Hair Grower is magical.
translation.fr: Ça ne m'étonne pas.Mon soin est vraiment magique.

translation.en: Yes, indeed, Addie.
Yes, indeed.
[Sarah] Addie's Hair Grower worked.
My hair grew back. And so did my confidence.
translation.fr: J'ai retrouvé mes cheveux...et ma confiance en moi.

translation.en: Now I got me a new man, CJ, who loves me and treats me right.
translation.fr: Maintenant, j'ai un nouvel homme.C.J. m'aime et me traite bien.

translation.en: My hair grew back so good, I thought, maybe I could sell it myself.
translation.fr: Mes cheveux ont si bien repousséque j'ai voulu le vendre en personne.

translation.en: That's why I wanna sell your Hair Grower.
That's why I wanna sell your Hair Grower.
translation.fr: Je veux vendre ton soin capillaire.

translation.en: That's why I wanna sell your Hair Grower.
translation.fr: Je veux vendre ton soin capillaire.

translation.en: But what do I say when the customers complain about the sulfur smell?
translation.fr: Je dis quoi pour l'odeur de soufre ?

translation.en: Oh, smile and say, "That's how you know the product is working."
translation.fr: Souriez et dites :"Ça montre que le soin fonctionne."

translation.en: Here.
I put it on at night.
Tie it up real good.
By morning, the smell's gone.
translation.fr: Le matin, ça ne sent plus.

translation.en: Mostly.
Now that's a tasty idea. Thanks.
[Addie] If a washerwoman like Sarah can figure it out,
translation.fr: Si une blanchisseusecomme Sarah y parvient,

translation.en: y'all should have no problem.
You've just got to convince the customers
that by using my product, that they'll look like me.
Or you all, at least.
[laughs] What?
No. No...
But, it... It works. Trust me.
You gals will be fine. You'll get the hang of it soon.
translation.fr: Ça ira, vous allez vite prendre le pli.

translation.en: In the meantime, just smile a lot.
They just get younger and dumber, don't they?
translation.fr: Elles sontde plus en plus jeunes et bêtes.

translation.en: Maybe I could sell your product.
I'd be honored, in fact.
I don't think sales is for you. [laughs]
translation.fr: La vente, ce n'est pas pour toi.

translation.en: I've been singing your praises for almost two years.
translation.fr: Je chante tes louangesdepuis presque deux ans.

translation.en: I got you, what? Eight new customers?
Mmm. That's not the same as selling door-to-door, though.
Oh, I know everything about Hair Grower.
translation.fr: Je sais tout sur ton produit.

translation.en: I'm proof that it works.
Sarah, I know what I'm doing.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que je fais.

translation.en: It's business.
Nothing personal.
Hiring a bunch of mulatto gals to con folks ain't gonna work.
translation.fr: Avec des métisses arnaqueuses,ça ne va pas marcher.

translation.en: Even a fool knows they didn't get good hair from your product.
translation.fr: Leurs cheveuxne doivent rien à ton produit.

translation.en: Their mamas and grandmamas got raped.
Language.
All I'm saying is...
when a customer looks at my hair,
they'll know they're seeing what your product can do.
Colored women will do anything to look like me.
translation.fr: Les femmes de couleurrêvent de me ressembler.

translation.en: Even if deep down they know they can't.
Now we've got a good arrangement here.
Laundry for hair treatments.
Let's not complicate things.
You saw the laundry in the back.
translation.fr: Tu as vu le linge au fond.

translation.en: I'll have it for you on Friday.
[Sarah] I was hesitant at first, but then I realized...
translation.fr: J'ai hésité au début,mais je me suis rendu compte...

translation.en: this is my calling.
That I could help others the way Addie helped me.
translation.fr: Je pouvais aider les autrescomme Addie m'a aidée.

translation.en: And that's why I'm here.
It worked for me.
It'll work for y'all.
That's one hell of a story.
Give me one tin.
Thank you.
Me too.
-[woman 1] I'll take one. -[woman 2] How much is it? [woman 3] She said it grow hair?
translation.fr: - C'est combien ?- Ça fait pousser les cheveux ?

translation.en: [woman 4] Thank you, baby.
[woman 5] It's worth the money.
[woman 6] I can't wait to try!
[Sarah] Let me know how you doin' with it. Check back in.
translation.fr: Revenez me dire comment ça se passe.

translation.en: -All right, then! -Thank you!
♪They just wanna talk that stuff Till I hit 'em with the realness ♪
-Sarah? What are you doin' here? -[Sarah] I did it.
translation.fr: Sarah ? Que fais-tu ici ? J'ai réussi.

translation.en: I sold 20 tins.
What now?
I borrowed a few tins of your Hair Grower.
After I told you no?
Just to see if I could sell 'em!
But you can't. It don't make sense!
-I figured if I just showed you-- -[Addie] You stole from me?
translation.fr: - Si je te montrais...- Tu les as volés ?

translation.en: After everything I've done for you?
translation.fr: Après tout ce que j'ai fait ?

translation.en: No, I'd never steal from you! I brought all the money. It's all for you!
translation.fr: Non, je t'ai apporté tout l'argent !

translation.en: I got you back on your feet.
I confided in you.
translation.fr: Je me suis confiée à toi.

translation.en: How could you?
I just wanted to show you that I can sell.
translation.fr: Ça prouve que je peux vendre.

translation.en: We can make a lot of money together. I got ideas--
Are you out of your mind?
Even in your Sunday best, you look like you just stepped off the plantation.
translation.fr: Même apprêtée, on diraitque tu viens de quitter la plantation.

translation.en: These are my products.
And I will not have the likes of you associated with them.
translation.fr: Je refuse qu'on les associeà quelqu'un comme toi.

translation.en: Sorry for overstepping.
It won't happen again.
Sarah!
For Addie's newest sales agent.
What happened?
I ain't got the right look.
Now, wait a minute, now you...
You're the most beautiful woman in the world.
translation.fr: Tu es la plus belle au monde.

translation.en: -Stop. -[CJ] No.
All these years I done made ads, I'd drawn every type of face there is.
translation.fr: Toutes ces années dans la pub,j'ai dessiné plein de visages.

translation.en: And ain't none more beautiful than yours.
translation.fr: Aucun ne rivalise avec ta beauté.

translation.en: Tell me what happened.
She treated me like I was nothing, CJ.
translation.fr: Elle m'a traitée comme un chien.

translation.en: I thought we was friends.
translation.fr: Je la prenais pour mon amie.

translation.en: Week after week, I sat in that chair. Told her stuff I ain't never told nobody.
translation.fr: Je lui ai confiédes choses très personnelles.

translation.en: I should've known I was just a customer to her.
And an ugly one at that.
Okay, stop.
I ain't gonna let you keep beating up on yourself, you hear?
translation.fr: Je ne te laisserai pas te rabaisser.

translation.en: You hear me?
I love you, CJ.
[CJ chuckles] Come here.
What you makin'?
From now on, I'm doing my own hair, making my own hair grower.
translation.fr: Je prépare mon propre soinde repousse capillaire.

translation.en: I'm through with Addie Munroe.
[woman] Mama!
What you doin' up?
Just workin' on a little something. Sit, there's something I wanna try.
translation.fr: Je travaille sur un truc.Viens, je veux essayer quelque chose.

translation.en: What is it?
Hair grower. Maybe.
Just something I'm fiddling around with.
Mmm. Smells better than Addie's already.
translation.fr: Ça sent meilleur que celui d'Addie.

translation.en: Just trying to figure out the right mix.
translation.fr: J'essaie de trouver le bon mélange.

translation.en: Where you been?
[woman] Ray Ray's Bar was hot tonight,
translation.fr: Le Ray Ray's Bar était bondé.

translation.en: and me and John was dancing the Big Bear Dance all night long.
translation.fr: Avec John, on a faitla danse de l'ours toute la nuit.

translation.en: Just... mm-mm-mmm.
-John, huh? -Mm-hmm.
[laughs] The guitar player?
Sit... Sit your behind down!
What did I tell you about that sponger?
[sighs] You ain't even met him yet.
I can tell by the way you talk about him, he ain't got no money.
translation.fr: Vu comment tu parles de lui,il est fauché.

translation.en: I know you think I'm puttin' on airs.
But...
you ain't cute or clever enough
translation.fr: tu n'es pas assez mignonne ou maligne

translation.en: to survive gettin' knocked up by some do-nothin' musician.
translation.fr: pour survivre si un bon à riende musicien te met enceinte.

translation.en: Gotta find somebody who'll make your life better. Like CJ.
translation.fr: Trouve quelqu'unqui améliore ta vie, comme C.J.

translation.en: Not having this conversation again.
translation.fr: Je ne veux plus parler de ça.

translation.en: You're too idle.
You need to call Dr. Collins.
He stood me up, remember?
That glass eye he got give me the willies.
translation.fr: Son œil de verre me fait peur.

translation.en: So? He's a doctor. And you ain't gettin' much younger.
translation.fr: Et alors ? Il est médecin.Tu ne rajeunis pas.

translation.en: You either go to college or find yourself a husband, you hear?
translation.fr: Va à l'université ou trouve-toi un époux.

translation.en: -[groans] -What's wrong?
My scalp is on fire, Mama.
translation.fr: Mon cuir chevelu est en feu, Maman.

translation.en: Okay, that's the last time I make it with lye. Come on!
Ooh! Just gotta get it out.
-[laughs] -[woman 1] Thank you, sister Sarah.
[woman 2] My hair grew two inches! [woman 1] God bless you.
translation.fr: Mes cheveux ont poussé ! Sois bénie !

translation.en: Hair Grower works!
[Lelia] Mama, you did it! You made a beautiful hair grower.
translation.fr: Tu as créé un bon soin de repousse.

translation.en: I'm so proud of you.
-Here you go. -[woman] Okay.
Sarah, I hear you. Open up.
Just a minute!
A few weeks ago, you left clean laundry on my doorstep.
translation.fr: Il y a quelques temps, tu as laissédu linge propre à ma porte.

translation.en: Then, nothing.
Thought maybe the Klan got you.
translation.fr: J'ai cru que le Klan t'avait eue.

translation.en: [coughs] Well, been a little sick.
You might not wanna get too close.
You can imagine my surprise when I heard Sarah Breedlove not only lives...
translation.fr: Imagine ma surprise quand on m'a ditque Sarah Breedlove était en vie...

translation.en: but is out testing hair grower.
-Me? That ain't-- -Better not be my tins.
translation.fr: - Moi ? Non...- Pas mes pots, j'espère.

translation.en: Rest assured...
we're settled up.
You really think you can compete with me?
translation.fr: Tu penses vraiment pouvoir me battre ?

translation.en: [smacks lips] Suit yourself,
but you'll fail soon enough.
And when you do,
I got a hamper full of dirty laundry with your name on it.
translation.fr: j'aurai un panier de linge sale pour toi.

translation.en: -CJ! -[CJ] Hmm?
-[laughs] CJ! -[CJ] Hmm?
Your sister wants me to send her 20 jars of Hair Grower,
translation.fr: Ta sœur veut que je lui envoie 20 pots,

translation.en: and she sent me money.
Peg-- Peggie sent money?
It's a miracle!
I think God is finally smiling down on me.
translation.fr: Je crois que Dieu me sourit enfin.

translation.en: She said she let her choir director try some of the product I sent,
translation.fr: Elle a laissé sa chef de chœuressayer mon produit.

translation.en: and now all the sopranos want it.
Huh. It says here, more Negroes are moving to Indianapolis.
translation.fr: Elle écritque les Noirs vont à Indianapolis.

translation.en: Property is cheap now on account of the recession and factories closing.
translation.fr: Les maisons sont bon marchéà cause de la fermeture des usines.

translation.en: As soon as Negroes move in, white folks run for the hills.
translation.fr: Dès que les Noirs arrivent,les Blancs s'enfuient.

translation.en: -[Sarah laughs] -Can you imagine?
Ofays go broke and they just up and close a factory,
translation.fr: Ils sont fauchés et ferment une usine.

translation.en: I mean, a whole factory, just like that.
Mmm. How is Cleophus gettin' along all by his lonesome?
translation.fr: Comment Cleophus s'en sort tout seul ?

translation.en: -Only your sister to look after him? -Daddy's doin' just fine.
translation.fr: - Seule ta sœur s'occupe de lui.- Papa va bien.

translation.en: What you gettin' at?
My product is just as good as Addie's. Maybe better.
translation.fr: Mon soin est aussi bienque celui d'Addie, voire mieux.

translation.en: Definitely smells better.
I can't be a washerwoman for the rest of my life, CJ.
translation.fr: Je ne serai pasblanchisseuse toute ma vie.

translation.en: Miss Jessie said there's three million Negro women in America.
translation.fr: Il y a trois millions de Noiresaux États-Unis.

translation.en: If I can get 'em all to buy just one jar of Hair Grower, I'll be a millionaire.
translation.fr: Si elles m'achètent toutes un pot,je serai millionnaire.

translation.en: -Well, I can't argue with that. -Yeah.
We'd have to leave St. Louis, though.
I'd never get anywhere in Addie Munroe's shadow.
translation.fr: Pour réussir, je dois m'éloigner d'Addie.

translation.en: I ain't movin' to Indianapolis.
translation.fr: Je ne vais pas à Indianapolis.

translation.en: I love you, but I ain't movin'.
translation.fr: Je t'aime, mais je reste là.

translation.en: I ain't movin'.
[Sarah] Indianapolis, here we come!
Where is Lelia? She better not make us miss this train.
translation.fr: Où est Lelia ?On ne doit pas rater ce train.

translation.en: Breaking up with John, thank Jesus.
translation.fr: Elle rompt avec John, Dieu merci.

translation.en: [Lelia] Mama!
[laughing] Mama!
We got hitched.
[laughs] You almost had me.
Nice to finally meet you, John.
You're a good sport to help with her luggage.
translation.fr: C'est gentil de porter ses bagages.

translation.en: -But we gotta be on our way. -No, Mama.
translation.fr: - Mais on doit y aller.- Non, Maman.

translation.en: John is my husband. He's comin' with us.
translation.fr: C'est mon mari. Il vient avec nous.

translation.en: Nice to meet you, Mom.
Lord, what did you do?
I got married, like you said.
translation.fr: Tu m'as dit de me marier.

translation.en: Welcome to the family, son.
-Good luck. -You pregnant?
No! I love him.
And he's not a do-nothin' either.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas un bon à rien.

translation.en: John's gonna open a juke joint.
-[Sarah] A juke joint? -[John] Mm-hmm.
Let's go.
I did like you said.
I found a rat.
Easy, Cleophus. Money's tight. We gotta make it stretch.
translation.fr: Doucement, Cleophus.On n'a pas beaucoup d'argent.

translation.en: Missy, I sure don't mind helpin',
translation.fr: Ça ne me gêne pas d'aider,

translation.en: but I don't take orders no more.
translation.fr: mais je ne reçois plus d'ordres.

translation.en: Lincoln freed me 40 years back!
translation.fr: Lincoln m'a libéré il y a 40 ans !

translation.en: That's why I'm gonna pay you.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que je paie.

translation.en: And that's why you're my favorite daughter-in-law!
Keep your eyes on your work. You're spilling more than you're filling.
translation.fr: Concentre-toi.Tu en mets plus à côté que dans le pot.

translation.en: Can I have my paper back?
If you don't like it here, you're welcome to find yourself other lodging,
translation.fr: Si ça te déplaît ici, tu peux déménager.

translation.en: gainful employment.
Yeah, how's that juke joint coming?
From now on...
you on rat duty.
And take that hat off! You're inside.
Yes, ma'am.
Living room window.
Baby, you got to show the people some razzle-dazzle. Some hope!
translation.fr: Chérie, il faut que ça claque,qu'il y ait de l'espoir !

translation.en: Well, but not false hope.
I ain't promisin' long, silky hair or whatever you put in this ad.
translation.fr: Je ne promets pas de longs cheveux soyeux.

translation.en: -What you want me to change? -Work in my story.
translation.fr: - Je change quoi ?- Sers-toi de mon histoire.

translation.en: Make it personal. Add some testimonials or something.
Folks will take a chance on my product if they believe in me. Right, Peggie?
translation.fr: Les gens essaieront mon soins'ils croient en moi.

translation.en: Yup! You gotta have heart.
Okay. Okay, Peggie.
I'll see what I can do.
[Sarah] Walker Hair Company. Got a nice ring to it, don't it?
translation.fr: Soins Capillaires Walker.Ça sonne bien, non ?

translation.en: Gotta admit, you're sure on to something.
translation.fr: C'est vrai, tu tiens un truc.

translation.en: Hair is in our blood.
translation.fr: On a ça dans le sang.

translation.en: All your uncles were barbers.
Just 'cause they've gone on to glory don't mean their legacy gotta die too.
translation.fr: Ils nous ont quittés,mais leur héritage ne doit pas mourir.

translation.en: One day all of this will be yours.
translation.fr: Un jour, tout ça sera à toi.

translation.en: I want you to learn the business.
-Why? -Do something with your education.
I got a husband now.
Who is about as useful as a bucket without a bottom.
translation.fr: Qui est aussi utile qu'un seau sans fond.

translation.en: Well, John and I are still gonna open up that juke joint.
I think he found a barn just outside of town.
translation.fr: Il a trouvé une grange pas loin.

translation.en: -[woman] Thank you. -There you go.
After all I went through to get out of the South?
translation.fr: Après mes efforts pour sortir du Sud ?

translation.en: Washed clothes till my hands were raw
translation.fr: Je me suis tuée à la tâche

translation.en: to put you through school.
Maybe even college.
Now all you wanna do is serve liquor to ex-cons and hustlers.
translation.fr: Tu veux juste servir de l'alcoolà d'anciens taulards et des escrocs.

translation.en: Hair is your dream, not mine.
-So what's your dream? -I don't know yet.
translation.fr: - Quel est le tien ?- Je l'ignore.

translation.en: So what happens when John runs off with a bar floozy?
translation.fr: Que feras-tuquand John s'enfuira avec une autre ?

translation.en: Then what?
Either you're back with me, or you're whoring.
translation.fr: Tu reviendras ou tu te prostitueras.

translation.en: Well, John says I have a knack for entertaining.
translation.fr: John dit que je divertis bien les gens.

translation.en: Right. So whorin', then.
You can be so cold-blooded sometimes, Mama.
translation.fr: Tu peux être sans pitié parfois.

translation.en: All I'm sayin' is don't gamble your future away on that man.
translation.fr: Ne te repose pas sur cet homme.

translation.en: Any man! Always make your own money.
translation.fr: Ni un autre ! Gagne ton propre argent.

translation.en: -But... -Nope, no buts.
-How you doin', ma'am? -[Lelia] Good mornin'.
My name is Lelia, and this is my mama.
translation.fr: Je m'appelle Lelia, et voici ma mère.

translation.en: We have a product here that I'm sure will change your life.
translation.fr: Notre soin va sûrement changer votre vie.

translation.en: Now, when I tell you this will make your hair grow faster than anything...
translation.fr: Il peut faire pousservos cheveux plus vite que tout...

translation.en: ♪ Have I been hiding? ♪ ♪ Wasting all my days ♪
[Sarah] Y'all ready?
CJ, go downstairs and get some more boxes.
I don't want my customers to leave empty-handed.
translation.fr: Mes clientes partiront les mains pleines.

translation.en: Of course, babe.
Thank you.
You want me to warm up the leftovers?
I think we made a mistake in moving here.
translation.fr: On n'aurait pas dû s'installer ici.

translation.en: Gotta figure something out. Quick. 'Cause we're almost out of money.
translation.fr: Il faut vite trouver une solution.On est presque à sec.

translation.en: The new hotel downtown...
they hiring.
I figure you and me, we can go down there, and...
I could be a bellhop, you can do laundry.
You don't just plant a seed and expect fruit the next day.
translation.fr: On n'a pas bâti Rome en un jour.

translation.en: The colored women here gotta get used to the idea of somebody else doin' their hair, that's all.
translation.fr: Les femmes de couleur doivents'habituer à se faire coiffer.

translation.en: Baby... you know I always love your big ideas, but--
translation.fr: Chérie, j'adore tes grandes idées, mais...

translation.en: -I'm not going back to laundry! -Now wait a minute, now.
We done all made sacrifices. You gonna do what's best for this family.
translation.fr: On a fait des sacrifices.Fais le mieux pour nous.

translation.en: You hear?
Sarah. Stop.
You got two weeks to turn this around.
After that, you gonna do whatsoever it takes to keep food on that table.
translation.fr: Après, tu feras ce qu'il fautpour qu'on mange à notre faim.

translation.en: -Gentlemen, Wonderful Hair Grower? -No, thank you.
You got dandruff, ma'am? Wonderful Hair Grower! ♪ Fight 'em all ♪
Ladies, you got bald patches or dandruff?
translation.fr: Vous avez une pelade ou des pellicules ?

translation.en: For your wife?
Good morning, ladies! You want thick, lovely hair?
translation.fr: Bonjour ! Vous voulezde beaux cheveux épais ?

translation.en: [Sarah] Wonderful Hair Grower?
-Wonderful Hair Grower, ma'am? -No.
Wonderful Hair Grower, ladies?
Wonderful Hair Grower? Thank you very much!
Yeah, I'm gonna try this!
-[woman 2] Need this! -[woman 1] We was talkin' about this.
translation.fr: - J'en ai besoin !- On en parlait.

translation.en: Extra, extra! Read all about it!
Black Jack Johnson takes on the Great White Hope in the fight of the century!
translation.fr: Jack Johnson face au grand espoir blanc,le combat du siècle !

translation.en: Sisters!
Sisters!
Let's talk about hair.
Hair can be freedom or bondage.
translation.fr: Les cheveux sontune liberté ou une servitude.

translation.en: The choice is yours.
Want a better station in life?
[woman 1] What is she sayin'?
Need to make more money?
Come on.
Let me show you how.
[woman 2] Let's hear what she talkin' about.
I had a Cain versus Abel relationship with my hair.
translation.fr: Avec mes cheveux, c'était Abel et Caïn.

translation.en: -Bet some of y'all do too, huh? -[woman 3] Oh, yeah.
translation.fr: - Je parie que vous aussi, hein ?- Oui.

translation.en: See, I was born free.
Two years after emancipation.
Was orphaned by seven.
Married at 14, pregnant at 15, widowed by 20.
translation.fr: Mariée à 14 ans,enceinte à 15 ans, veuve à 20 ans.

translation.en: Had to fend for myself and my baby girl.
translation.fr: J'ai dû m'en sortir avec ma fille.

translation.en: Only work I could find was...
in the fields...
or as a washerwoman.
Didn't have time to take care of my hair.
translation.fr: Je ne pouvais pasprendre soin de mes cheveux.

translation.en: I know you know what I mean.
-[woman 4] Yes. -[Sarah] Hard work on the farm, ain't it?
translation.fr: - Oui.- Vous travaillez à la ferme ?

translation.en: Wanted to work at the new hotel, but they say I ain't got the right look.
translation.fr: Je voulais bosser au nouvel hôtel,mais mon apparence ne convient pas.

translation.en: How many of y'all know what she talkin' about?
translation.fr: Combien savent de quoi elle parle ?

translation.en: [woman 5] Yes, indeed.
They put us down, don't give us nothin'.
translation.fr: Ils nous rabaissent, ne nous donnent rien.

translation.en: Tell us we're ugly, make us feel ugly.
translation.fr: Ils nous disent qu'on est laides.

translation.en: [woman 6] That's right.
I tell you what. You come by my salon, I'll do your hair for free.
translation.fr: Venez gratuitementvous faire coiffer dans mon salon.

translation.en: You got yourself a deal.
Bet you some of y'all are wonderin' why I would do somethin' for nothin'.
translation.fr: Vous vous demandezpourquoi je fais ça gratuitement.

translation.en: [woman 7] Right.
'Cause I know how hard it is to care for our hair.
translation.fr: C'est dur de prendre soin de nos cheveux.

translation.en: I know what it's like to not have running water or products made for us.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que c'est de ne pas avoird'eau courante ni de produits pour nous.

translation.en: But most important, I know if she look good, we all look good.
translation.fr: Surtout, je sais que si elle est belle,on est toutes belles.

translation.en: -[woman 1] Yes! -[woman 2] Right about that.
If you look respectable, we all look respectable.
translation.fr: Si vous avez l'air respectable,on l'est toutes.

translation.en: [women] Mmm. That's right.
Everything we do as Negroes reflects back on us.
translation.fr: Nos actions se répercutentsur toutes les Noires.

translation.en: So if I can help one person, I'm lifting us all up.
translation.fr: Si j'aide une personne,je nous élève toutes.

translation.en: -[women 3] Yes, lift us. -[woman 4] Okay.
Wonderful Hair Grower gives me the confidence every day...
translation.fr: Le Wonderful Hair Growerme donne confiance chaque jour

translation.en: ...to beat the enemy.
Slay the demon.
Fight the good fight as a colored woman in America.
translation.fr: me battre en tant que femme noire.

translation.en: [woman 1] You gotta stand up.
Wonderful Hair leads to wonderful opportunities.
translation.fr: De beaux cheveux offrentde belles opportunités.

translation.en: -[woman 1] Yes. Amen! -You hear me?
-Did you hear me? -[woman 3] Yeah, I heard you.
Now, who wants wonderful opportunities?
Come on up and get your opportunity.
Thank you.
Sarah, we need more shampoo!
-You're taking too long! -I'm not gonna rush and burn her.
translation.fr: - Tu es lente.- Je ne veux pas la brûler.

translation.en: I'm just asking you to hurry.
Customers can hear y'all.
We need more pullers and pins and oil.
translation.fr: Il nous faut des épingles, de l'huile.

translation.en: -We need help, Sarah. -Help is on the way.
translation.fr: - On a besoin d'aide.- Ça arrive.

translation.en: Now I sent Lelia out for supplies, and a gal named Esther,
translation.fr: Lelia va en rapporteret une certaine Esther

translation.en: who came highly recommended, will be here any minute.
translation.fr: qu'on nous a recommandée va arriver.

translation.en: That's all well and good, but I need to finish this one's hair now.
translation.fr: C'est bien,mais je dois finir cette coupe.

translation.en: -You know how to use a hot comb? -[woman] I do.
translation.fr: - Tu sais utiliser un peigne chauffant ?- Oui.

translation.en: [Sarah] Be right back.
Mrs. Walker.
-I'm Esther. -Oh.
I can do hair. I can make product. Anything you need.
translation.fr: Je peux faire tout ce que vous voulez.

translation.en: Check these ladies. See who's dry. Get some Hair Grower and oil their scalp,
translation.fr: Va voir ces femmes. Applique le soin

translation.en: don't start pressin' till I make sure you know what you're doin'.
translation.fr: mais rien de plus. - Sarah !- J'arrive !

translation.en: -[CJ]Sarah! -[Sarah] Coming!
Sarah!
Okay!
-Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry, ma'am. -[woman gasps]
I'm sorry.
-Hey. -[CJ] Yeah. Hey.
I'll be right back. Excuse me for a second.
-Listen, we need more help. -I know. Ain't it wonderful?
translation.fr: - On a besoin d'aide.- Je sais. C'est génial, non ?

translation.en: The Hair Grower's doing so well. We should put out more product.
translation.fr: Ça marche.On doit sortir d'autres produits.

translation.en: -We barely got enough room to live. -Then let's get a bigger place.
translation.fr: - On a à peine assez de place.- Déménageons.

translation.en: Babe--
We just now making a profit. Can we just enjoy it?
translation.fr: On commence à réussir. On peut profiter ?

translation.en: Tonight...
why don't we get a couple of steaks and a bottle of Cognac
translation.fr: et si on savourait des steaks, du cognac

translation.en: and sleep in in the morning?
translation.fr: et qu'on se levait tard demain ?

translation.en: I want a whole line of products.
translation.fr: Je veux toute une gamme de produits.

translation.en: Shampoo, pressin' oil,
maybe somethin' for dandruff?
I'm gonna make it easier for colored women to take good care of their hair.
translation.fr: Je vais aider les Noiresavec leurs cheveux.

translation.en: There's such a thing as growing too fast.
[Sarah] That's why we gotta be smart about it.
Do things professional-like. You know any lawyers?
Oh, Sarah.
Yeah, he been braggin' about his cousin just finished law school.
translation.fr: Son cousin a fini ses études.

translation.en: Since when you been talkin' to the numbers man?
You want me to call him or not?
[woman] Mister!
Ma'am, I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
I studied incorporation at Columbia, yes.
translation.fr: J'ai étudié le droit des sociétésà Columbia.

translation.en: So you'll look into it?
Mrs. Walker, business can be ruthless.
-Especially for a-- -Colored woman?
Can't be no worse than taking in laundry.
You'll be competing with companies that make their products for pennies in big factories.
translation.fr: Vous défierez des sociétésqui fabriquent leurs soins à bas prix.

translation.en: That's why I need me a good lawyer. Interested?
translation.fr: Il me faut donc un bon avocat. Intéressé ?

translation.en: [man] You beat my suitcase, boy?
No, sir.
You niggers think you're Jack Johnson now.
translation.fr: Les nègres se prennent pour Jack Johnson,

translation.en: Treat a white man's property any old way.
translation.fr: - abîment les affaires des Blancs.- Non.

translation.en: No, sir. I carefully placed it on the cart.
Don't know how it could've gotten scratched.
translation.fr: J'ignore comment elle a été abîmée.

translation.en: You're calling me a liar, boy?
How soon can I start?
That's... That's what I'm sayin', Pop. We got big plans for our company.
translation.fr: On a de grands projets pour notre société.

translation.en: First thing we're gonna do is do what they call incorporating. Make everything legal.
translation.fr: Il faut qu'on monte une société,que tout soit légal.

translation.en: [Cleophus] Boy, you ain't got no sense.
-What's that you're mumblin' about? -You keep sayin' "our company."
translation.fr: - Qu'est-ce que tu racontes ?- Tu dis "notre société".

translation.en: -Sarah calls it her company. -So?
translation.fr: Pour Sarah, c'est sa société. Et alors ?

translation.en: You ain't listenin'. Her idea, her product, her money.
translation.fr: Tu n'écoutes pas.C'est son idée, son produit, son argent.

translation.en: -My name. -Your name?
You remember Massa Walker?
Nah. You was too young.
When he would talk to us about the plantation,
translation.fr: Quand il parlait de la plantation,

translation.en: he'd always say "our field, our house."
translation.fr: il disait toujours :"notre champ, notre maison."

translation.en: Turns out, that son of a bitch didn't free our asses
until two years after the Civil War was over.
translation.fr: deux ans après la finde la guerre de Sécession.

translation.en: What's your point, old man?
What kind of self-respecting Negro works for his wife?
translation.fr: Quel genre de Noir qui se respectetravaille pour sa femme ?

translation.en: I'm making twice as much now than I did back in St. Louis.
translation.fr: Je gagne deux fois plus qu'à Saint-Louis.

translation.en: Next thing you'll be wearin' a corset!
Man needs something of his own. Especially a colored man.
translation.fr: L'homme a besoin de posséder.Surtout un homme de couleur.

translation.en: Never get your money where you get your honey.
translation.fr: Ne mélange pas travail et amour.

translation.en: [man] One of the great events in sports history.
Heavyweight champion Jack Johnson will defend his crown
translation.fr: Le champion Jack Johnsondéfendra son titre

translation.en: against the man who is already a legend in his time.
translation.fr: contre celui qui est déjà une légende.

translation.en: Former heavyweight champion James J. Jeffries.
translation.fr: L'ancien champion poids lourdJames J. Jeffries.

translation.en: [Cleophus] "Jack Johnson throws a thunderous left!
translation.fr: Jack Johnson porte un gauche tonitruant !

translation.en: Jeffries counters with a jab!"
Mmm! This cake is good.
When I told you to get some cake, I meant to pass out to the guests.
translation.fr: Ne mange pas tout, sers les invités.

translation.en: "Jack Johnson moves in with a slug to the jaw!
translation.fr: Jack Johnson lui met un coupdans la mâchoire !

translation.en: Jeffries is down!"
-[men cheering] -Oh! Oh, come on.
Come on, now. Don't fail me now!
translation.fr: Allez. Ne me lâche pas maintenant !

translation.en: Black Jack is winning!
-Oh, I can't-- -Pop!
-Blood pressure-- -Oh, no!
Oh! Oh, God.
-Hurry up, CJ. What is it sayin'? -All right, hold on, man.
translation.fr: - Dépêche-toi, C.J. Ça dit quoi ?- Attendez.

translation.en: Don't jam on me now!
-What it say, CJ? -All right, here we go.
"Jeffries is down. Will the White Hope rise?"
translation.fr: Jeffries est à terre.L'espoir blanc se relèvera-t-il ?

translation.en: No.
The referee calls it. The fight is over.
translation.fr: L'arbitre annonce la fin du combat.

translation.en: -Black Jack Johnson won! -[all cheering, shouting]
[Sarah] It's our time now, baby!
Oh, Peggie! Can you believe it?
Sarah, you need to see this.
Addie Munroe has moved here, and she's opening up a salon.
translation.fr: Addie Munroe a emménagé ici,elle ouvre un salon.

translation.en: Mama, where are you goin'? You don't have to worry about Addie!
translation.fr: Maman, où vas-tu ?Ne t'inquiète pas pour Addie.

translation.en: Your place is bigger.
You got more products, more customers, more...
translation.fr: Tu as plus de produits,plus de clientes, plus...

translation.en: Oh, no. You can't compete with that.
translation.fr: Oh, non. On ne peut pas rivaliser avec ça.

translation.en: [Sarah] "Oh, no" is right.
Addie!
As I live and breathe. Look who it is, Mama!
translation.fr: Bonté divine. Regarde qui est là !

translation.en: Afternoon.
[Lelia] How long you and Jean been in Indianapolis?
translation.fr: Depuis quand Gene et toi êtes ici ?

translation.en: Oh, I'm afraid that Jean's passed.
[Lelia] So sorry for your loss.
Yeah, you have our condolences.
Thank you. It was quite unexpected, but I am ready for a fresh start.
translation.fr: Merci. C'était soudain,mais je suis prête pour un nouveau départ.

translation.en: My salon in St. Louis is doing so well.
translation.fr: Mon salon à Saint-Louis se porte bien.

translation.en: I heard Indianapolis is booming
translation.fr: On dit qu'Indianapolis est en plein boom

translation.en: and in dire need of a woman with my talents, so I figured, why not?
translation.fr: et cherche une femme talentueuse,donc je me suis lancée.

translation.en: How are you doing, Sarah?
Haven't heard hide nor hair about your little company.
translation.fr: Je n'ai vu aucun signe de ta société.

translation.en: I'm doin' good. Real good. In fact--
translation.fr: Je vais bien. Très bien. En fait...

translation.en: Well, I best be getting back.
You have a blessed day now, Addie.
You see that?
-The black eye? -Mm-hmm.
I heard Jean used to beat her silly.
translation.fr: Il paraît que Gene la battait.

translation.en: He probably ain't dead.
-‹She just running. -Mm-hmm.
Guess light-skin don't mean you gonna have a happy marriage.
translation.fr: La peau claire ne garantit pasun mariage heureux.

translation.en: You know, all we women in the same boat.
translation.fr: On est toutes dans le même bateau.

translation.en: Please. She ain't as much as set a toe in our boat.
translation.fr: Elle n'a même pasun orteil dans notre bateau.

translation.en: Always gon' be easier for the likes of Addie.
translation.fr: C'est plus facile pour celles comme Addie.

translation.en: Soon as she open her salon, all my customers gonna flock to her.
translation.fr: Toutes mes clientesvont se ruer chez elle.

translation.en: Don't say that.
Gotta find a way to set myself apart.
translation.fr: Je dois trouver un moyen de me démarquer.

translation.en: [CJ] Riots in seven cities.
[Ransom] I heard ten.
Twenty-six Negroes killed.
All because of Jack Johnson winnin' the fight.
translation.fr: Tout ça à causede la victoire de Jack Johnson.

translation.en: My, my, Gertrude. You look like a schoolgirl.
translation.fr: Oh là là, Gertrude.On dirait une lycéenne.

translation.en: That hair sure is growin'.
I can't believe it. My hair ain't never reached my shoulders before.
translation.fr: C'est incroyable. Je n'ai jamais eules cheveux si longs.

translation.en: I see you, Annabelle. Lookin' good.
Sarah Walker, you are royalty.
translation.fr: Sarah Walker, vous êtes une reine.

translation.en: We oughta call you Madam.
How you doin', Addie?
Oh, blessed and highly favored.
Love that.
So elegant.
-♪ I sing because I'm happy ♪ -♪ Ooh ♪
translation.fr: Je chante parce que je suis heureux

translation.en: ♪ I sing because I'm free ♪
translation.fr: Je chante parce que je suis libre

translation.en: ♪ His eye is on the sparrow ♪
♪ And I know that he watches me ♪
translation.fr: Et je sais qu'Il me regarde

translation.en: ♪ He watches me ♪
Please be seated.
[minister] Can I get an amen?
[all] Amen.
[minister] Ah, yes, indeed.
Those that are new to Bethel AME,
translation.fr: Les nouveaux à l'église de Bethel,

translation.en: please rise and let us acknowledge your divine presence.
translation.fr: levez-vous pour que l'on vous salue.

translation.en: [woman whispers] What is she doin'?
[CJ] Where's she goin'?
Ain't no one tell her to go up there.
translation.fr: On ne lui a pas dit d'avancer.

translation.en: Thank y'all for welcoming me.
I happen to need a fellowship.
[all] Amen.
Just as Jesus has guided my path, and you have opened your doors to me,
translation.fr: Comme Jésus a guidé mon chemin,et que vous m'avez ouvert vos portes,

translation.en: I would like to open the doors of my new salon to you.
translation.fr: je voudrais vous ouvrirles portes de mon nouveau salon.

translation.en: Addie's won't be no ordinary salon. No, Lord.
translation.fr: Ce ne sera pas un salon ordinaire.

translation.en: Next week in the heart of downtown,
I will open the first freestanding storefront,
translation.fr: je vais ouvrirle premier salon indépendant,

translation.en: not in someone's kitchen, colored salon in all of Indiana.
translation.fr: pas dans une cuisine privée,pour les Noires de tout l'Indiana.

translation.en: Thank you.
[echoing faintly] I would like to take this time
to acknowledge those that aren't with us...
Babe.
[minister] Those that weren't able to make it here today.
translation.fr: Ceux qui n'ont pas pu venir aujourd'hui.

translation.en: [Addie, echoing] Colored women will do anything to look like me...
translation.fr: Les femmes de couleurrêvent de me ressembler.

translation.en: even if deep down, they know they can't.
Now we've got a good arrangement here.
Laundry for hair treatments.
Let's not complicate things.
These are my products.
And I will not have the likes of you associated with them.
translation.fr: Je refuse qu'on les associeà quelqu'un comme toi.

translation.en: Sarah, come on, open up, now.
Girl, I see you in there. Come on. Open up.
[Addie] You'll fail soon enough.
[referee] Two...
[Addie] And when you do...
[referee] ...four...
[Addie] ...I got a hamper full of dirty laundry with your name on it.
translation.fr: ...j'aurai un panier de linge sale pour toi.

translation.en: -[CJ] What's goin' on, now? -Saints.
-Sarah... -Can I have your attention, please?
Can I have your attention?
I just wanna share...
the divine message God just sent me.
translation.fr: le message divin que Dieu m'a envoyé.

translation.en: Now so many of y'all in the congregation have flourished using my product.
translation.fr: Beaucoup des fidèlesse sont épanouies avec mon produit.

translation.en: Which is why the good Lord...
oh, is he ever so good...
[all] Yes, he is.
...gave me the vision
to lower the price of my Hair Grower as a thank you.
translation.fr: de baisser mes prix pour vous remercier.

translation.en: Buy one, get one free. Can I get an amen?
translation.fr: Deux pour le prix d'un.Je veux avoir un amen ?

translation.en: [all] Amen!
I'll be taking orders in the front of the church.
First five ladies get free hair stylin', tell all your friends.
translation.fr: Les cinq premièresse feront coiffer gratuitement.

translation.en: Thank you, Jesus. Thank you.
[CJ] It's gonna take us months to fill these orders.
translation.fr: Ça va nous prendre des mois.

translation.en: We ain't got enough workers, or storage, or equipment.
translation.fr: On n'a pas assez d'ouvriers,de stockage ni d'équipements.

translation.en: This is a house, baby. It ain't a damn factory.
translation.fr: C'est une maison, pas une usine.

translation.en: We can do it, CJ. We are doin' it!
It's doin' good.
-What was that? -[voice shouting]
[Sarah] Everybody out! Come on!
-[Lelia] Go! -[CJ] There's a fire!
-[Lelia] Where's John at? -[Ransom] I don't know. It was his shift.
[CJ] No! I'll get him. Y'all, go on out! I got it!
translation.fr: Non ! Je vais le chercher. Sors !

translation.en: Hey, what's goin' on?
-Did you leave the product burning? -I just stepped outside to smoke.
translation.fr: - Tu l'as laissé brûler ?- Je suis sorti fumer.

translation.en: -This is all your f-- -[loud blast]
[Lelia] Mama!
[man] Right here.
[man] Hurry up, now!
[man] Can you pump it any quicker?
All right, keep it goin'.
I never should've let her get to me.
I should've kept my eye on the sparrow.
It's okay, baby. It's okay.
How we gonna eat?
-Where we gonna sleep? -We gonna figure it out.
translation.fr: - Où on va dormir ?- On va trouver.

translation.en: Get a job at the hotel if we have to.
translation.fr: On va travailler à l'hôtel s'il le faut.

translation.en: -We'll figure it out. -[sighs]
[man] Come on, now, hurry up!
But if you need a place to go, then, you know where to come,
translation.fr: En cas de besoin, vous savez où aller

translation.en: until Sarah gets back on her feet.
You know, let's hope she does that.
I'm right here for you in the meantime. Okay, ladies?
translation.fr: Je suis là pour vous. D'accord, mesdames ?

translation.en: That's very important that you have somewhere to get your hair done.
translation.fr: C'est très importantd'avoir un endroit où se faire coiffer.

translation.en: Sarah, I am so sorry.
I came as soon as I could.
translation.fr: Je suis venue dès que j'ai pu.

translation.en: You are so brave.
[Sarah] Please.
Save the crocodile tears. You know you came to gloat.
translation.fr: Ravale tes larmes, tu es venue jubiler.

translation.en: You're upset, so I won't take that personally.
Uh, I just came to offer my services, free of charge, to all of your clients.
translation.fr: Je viens offrir mes servicesgratuitement à toutes tes clientes.

translation.en: You ain't comin' up here stealin' my customers.
translation.fr: Tu ne viens pas voler mes clientes.

translation.en: Well, I would never steal.
You had your foot on my throat for years.
translation.fr: Tu m'as longtemps maintenue à ta merci.

translation.en: Told me I was worthless, useless, too dark to shine.
translation.fr: Tu m'as dit que j'étais inutile,trop noire pour briller.

translation.en: But the mere inkling that I might be doin' well
translation.fr: Mais dès que je m'en sors bien,

translation.en: made you move over a thousand miles,
clear across country, just to dim my light.
You are out of your mind.
Find yourself a new whipping post 'cause them days is over for me.
In fact, take a seat.
'Cause I'm about to replace all this with a factory.
translation.fr: Je vais remplacer tout ça par une usine.

translation.en: And leave you in the dust.
translation.fr: Et te faire mordre la poussière.

translation.en: -Sarah... -No, no, no, no, no.
You want to speak to me?
You call me Madam CJ Walker.
♪ Me, I'm a creator ♪
